sentence.Network_cn: 乔恩朝气蓬勃，精力旺盛。

sentence.Network_en: An amusement park is the perfect locale for a bunch of irrepressible youngsters to have all sorts of adventures.
sentence.Network_cn: 游乐场是一帮精力过剩的年轻人寻求各种惊险刺激的绝佳场所。

sentence.Network_en: You cannot keep her quiet for long ; she's irrepressible!
sentence.Network_cn: 想让她多安静会儿可办不到, 她总是欢蹦乱跳的!
